long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop second-guessing your words! This extension helps you to rephrase text for any situation and convert it to the desired case.

Key Features:
1. 📝 Case Conversion (Free): Instantly convert your text to Title Case, lowercase, UPPERCASE & more!
2. 🎭 Tone Adjustment (Paid): Professional, informal, or anything in between!
3. 🌎 Works Everywhere: Use it on Gmail, WhatsApp, Notion, Reddit & more!

💡Tip: Modify text with a right-click or keyboard shortcut. 🖱️⌨️


>>> CHANGELOG <<<

>>> 1.1.1 (2024-10-29)
Bug Fixes:
🐛 Usability: We've made a bug fix for the issue with loading extension in Chrome version 130+

>>> 1.1.0 (2024-06-07)
New Features:
🌟 Alternate Case: Easily convert your text to AlTeRnAtE CaSe (Hello → HeLlO)
✨ Accent Removal: Quickly remove accent marks from your text (Café → Cafe)

>>> 1.0.3 (2024-05-08)
Bug Fixes:

Bug Fixes:

>>> 1.0.0 (2024-04-20)
